00001 /**
00002  * \file MPFRExponential.hpp
00003  * \brief Header for MPFRExponential
00004  *
00005  * Sampling exactly from the normal distribution for MPFR.
00006  *

00008  * the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00009  * http://randomlib.sourceforge.net/
00010  **********************************************************************/
00011 
00012 #if !defined(RANDOMLIB_MPFREXPONENTIAL_HPP)
00013 #define RANDOMLIB_MPFREXPONENTIAL_HPP \
00014   "$Id: cdb75307df601b5beba371dea0714a151c765a35 $"
00015 
00016 #include <RandomLib/MPFRRandom.hpp>
00017 
00018 namespace RandomLib {
00019 
00020   /**
00021    * \brief The exponential distribution for MPFR.
00022    *
00023    * This is a transcription of ExactExponential (version 1.4) for use with
00024    * MPFR.
00025    *
00026    * This class uses mutable private objects.  So a single MPFRExponential
00027    * object cannot safely be used by multiple threads.  In a multi-processing
00028    * environment, each thread should use a thread-specific MPFRExponential
00029    * object.
00030    *
00031    * @tparam bits the number of bits in each digit.
00032    **********************************************************************/
00033   template<int bits = 32> class MPFRExponential {
00034   public:
00035 
00036     /**
00037      * Initialize the MPFRExponential object.
00038      **********************************************************************/
00039     MPFRExponential() {};
00040     /**
00041      * Sample from the exponential distribution with mean 1 returning a
00042      * MPFRRandom.
00043      *
00044      * @param[out] t the MPFRRandom result.
00045      * @param[in,out] r a GMP random generator.
00046      **********************************************************************/
00047     void operator()(MPFRRandom<bits>& t, gmp_randstate_t r) const
00048     { Compute(r); _x.swap(t); }
00049     /**
00050      * Sample from the exponential distribution with mean 1.
00051      *
00052      * @param[out] val the sample from the exponential distribution
00053      * @param[in,out] r a GMP random generator.
00054      * @param[in] round the rounding direction.
00055      * @return the MPFR ternary result (+1/-1 if val is larger/smaller than the
00056      *   exact sample).
00057      **********************************************************************/
00058     int operator()(mpfr_t val, gmp_randstate_t r, mpfr_rnd_t round) const
00059     { Compute(r); return _x(val, r, round); }
00060   private:
00061     // Disable copy constructor and assignment operator
00062     MPFRExponential(const MPFRExponential&);
00063     MPFRExponential& operator=(const MPFRExponential&);
00064     int ExpFraction(gmp_randstate_t r, MPFRRandom<bits>& p) const {
00065       // The early bale out
00066       if (p.TestHighBit(r)) return 0;
00067       // Implement the von Neumann algorithm
00068       _w.Init();
00069       if (!_w.LessThan(r, p)) return 1;
00070       while (true) {
00071         _v.Init(); if (!_v.LessThan(r, _w)) return 0;
00072         _w.Init(); if (!_w.LessThan(r, _v)) return 1;
00073       }
00074     }
00075     void Compute(gmp_randstate_t r) const {
00076       _x.Init();
00077       unsigned k = 0;
00078       while (!ExpFraction(r, _x)) { ++k; _x.Init(); }
00079       if (k & 1) _x.SetHighBit(r);
00080       _x.AddInteger(k >> 1);
00081       return;
00082     }
00083     mutable MPFRRandom<bits> _x;
00084     mutable MPFRRandom<bits> _v;
00085     mutable MPFRRandom<bits> _w;
00086   };
00087 
00088 } // namespace RandomLib
00089 
00090 #endif  // RANDOMLIB_MPFREXPONENTIAL_HPP
